message: Let's start with a fair offer. You get 10% and I get 90%.
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can have 20% and I'll take 80%.
Let's be reasonable.  You get 20%, I get 80%. This is still better than nothing in a few rounds.
I'm not giving up yet. You can have 30% and I'll take 70%.
This is my final offer.  I'm not giving up more, and the value of the money is dropping for both of us.
